browserNotSupported: Your browser is not supported for playing this file.

messages.videoPlayerError: The video player encountered an unrecoverable error.

failedRetrievingDisplayPreferences: Unable to get display preferences. Using last known settings.
libraryEmptyFilters: No matches. Remove some filters to show more items

links.poweredByJellyfin: This server is powered by Jellyfin
links.reportAnIssue: Report an issue with this client

login.serverAddressMustBeUrl: Server address must be a valid URL
login.serverVersionTooLow: Server version needs to be 10.7.0 or higher
login.kickedOut: Authorization has been revoked and this session is no longer valid. Please log in again

metadataNoResultsMatching: No results matching "{search}". Press enter to create a new one.
name: Name
serverVersionTooLow: Server version needs to be 10.7.0 or higher

apiKeys.createKeyFailure: Error creating a new API key
apiKeys.createKeySuccess: Successfully created a new API key
apiKeys.description: Add and revoke API keys for external access to your server

EnablePlayTo.description: Detect devices within your network and offer the ability to control them remotely.

EnableDebugLog.description: Create large log files and should only be used as needed for troubleshooting purposes.

ClientDiscoveryIntervalSeconds.description: Determines the duration in seconds between SSDP searches.

EnableServer.description: Allows UPnP devices on your network to browse and play content.

BlastAliveMessages.description: Enable this if the server is not detected reliably by other UPnP devices on your network.

AliveMessageIntervalSeconds.description: Determines the duration in seconds between blast alive messages.

DefaultUserId.description: Determines which user library should be displayed on connected devices. This can be overridden for each device using profiles.

custom.subtitle: Create a custom profile to target a new device or override a system profile.

system.subtitle: System profiles are read-only. Changes to a system profile will be saved to a new custom profile.

name.info: Set the name of this profile.

userLibrary.info: Select which user library to display to the device. Leave empty to inherit the default setting.

maxStreamQuality.info: Specify a maximum bitrate when streaming.

musicTranscodeQuality.info: Specify a maximum bitrate when streaming music.

plainFolder.text: Display all folders as plain storage folders
plainFolder.info: All folders are represented in DIDL as "object.container.storageFolder" instead of a more specific type, such as "object.container.person.musicArtist".

plainVideo.text: Display all videos as plain video items
plainVideo.info: All videos are represented in DIDL as "object.item.videoItem" instead of a more specific type, such as "object.item.videoItem.movie".

image.title: Image Settings
image.albumMaxDimension: Maximum resolution of album art exposed via the upnp:albumArtURI property.
image.iconMaxDimension: Maximum resolution of icons exposed via the upnp:icon property.

embedDidl.info: Some devices prefer this method for obtaining album art. Others may fail to play with this option enabled.

singleEmbed.info: Some devices will not render properly if multiple images are embedded within Didl.

albumPN.info: PN used for album art, within the dlna:profileID attribute on upnp:albumArtURI. Some devices require a specific value, regardless of the size of the image.

device.title: Device identification
device.info: Enter at least one identification criteria.
device.infoText: A case-insensitive substring or regex expression.

server.title: Server identification
server.info: These values control how the server will present itself to clients.

protocolInfo.info: The value that will be used when responding to GetProtocolInfo requests from the device.

sonyAggregationFlags.info: Determines the content of the aggreagationFlags element in the urn:schemas-sonycom:av namespace.

directPlay.title: Direct Play
directPlay.text: Add direct play profiles to indicate which formats the device can handle natively.

transcoding.title: Transcoding
transcoding.text: Add transcoding profiles to indicate which formats should be used when transcoding is required.

containers.title: Containers
containers.text: Container profiles indicate the limitations of a device when playing specific formats. If a limitation applies then the media will be transcoded, even if the format is configured for direct play.

codecs.title: Codecs
codecs.text: Codec profiles indicate the limitations of a device when playing specific codecs. If a limitation applies then the media will be transcoded, even if the codec is configured for direct play.

responses.title: Responses
responses.text: Response profiles provide a way to customize information sent to the device when playing certain kinds of media.

devices.description: See and manage the devices connected to your server
devices.name: Devices

home.description: Configure your home sections and home screen layout
home.name: Home screen

liveTvAndDvr.description: Manage TV tuners, guide data providers and DVR settings
liveTvAndDvr.name: Live TV & DVR

logs.description: Read and search server logs and user activity
logs.name: Logs & activity

mediaPlayers.description: Configure how the media players behave for this device
mediaPlayers.name: Media players

networking.description: Manage the network settings of this server
networking.name: Networking

notifications.description: Manage and configure notification sent by this server
notifications.name: Notifications

playback.description: Edit your playback preferences for this device
playback.name: Playback

plugins.description: Add and configure new features for this server
plugins.name: Plugins

scheduledTasks.description: Manage scheduled tasks running on this server
scheduledTasks.name: Scheduled tasks

server.description: Configure this server's language and branding
server.name: Server

subtitles.description: Control how subtitles are displayed on this device
subtitles.name: Subtitles

transcodingAndStreaming.description: Manage how this server handles transcoding and streaming to clients
transcodingAndStreaming.name: Transcoding & streaming

reasons.audioBitDepthNotSupported: The audio's bit depth is not supported
reasons.audioBitrateNotSupported: The audio's bitrate is not supported
reasons.audioChannelsNotSupported: The number of audio channels is not supported
reasons.audioCodecNotSupported: The audio codec is not supported
reasons.audioProfileNotSupported: The audio codec's profile is not supported
reasons.audioSampleRateNotSupported: The audio's sample rate is not supported
reasons.containerBitrateExceedsLimit: The container bitrate exceeds the set limit
reasons.secondaryAudioNotSupported: Secondary audio tracks are not supported
reasons.subtitleCodecNotSupported: The subtitle codec is not supported
reasons.videoBitDepthNotSupported: The video's bit depth is not supported
reasons.videoCodecNotSupported: The video codec is not supported
reasons.videoFramerateNotSupported: The video's framerate is not supported
reasons.videoLevelNotSupported: The video codec's level is not supported
reasons.videoProfileNotSupported: The video codec's profile is not supported
reasons.videoResolutionNotSupported: The video's resolution is not supported

unableToToggleLike: Unable to change the liked status of the element
unableToTogglePlayed: Unable to update the watch status

validation.bothPasswordsSame: Both passwords must be the same
